name: Mortas 64 demo
description:
Story: Equipped with only your mighty sword and a small but sturdy shield, you have been tasked to explore the dungeon and clear out any enemies that come across your path.

Personal Note: This is my first game published. It was made in 14 day for the 32bit jam. It was challenging to balance this and school. Any support is greatly appreciated

Start - Enter

Movement - WASD

Camera Movement - IJKL

Attack - Up 

Block - Down

Interact / key - Left
